arts.ttl: Pat Bonner notes what Anthony Ralston didn't do alongside Yang Hyun-Jun for Celtic v Motherwell
arts.sum: But Pat Bonner noted how Ralston hardly ever bombed forward when playing with Yang on the right-hand side in the first half, as he told BBC Radio Scotland . Pat Bonner on Anthony Ralston not going forward before assist for Nicolas Kuhn’s goal

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers certain there is more to come from Arne Engels and Celtic
arts.sum: Celtic manager Brendan Rodgers has been impressed with midfielder Arne Engels in training, and he was able to bring that ability to the pitch in today's win...

arts.ttl: Brendan Rodgers provides injury update on vital Celtic star after Motherwell hammering
arts.sum: Speaking to the Beeb, Rodgers said: “Yeah, he should hopefully be okay (for the weekend). Brendan Rodgers has addressed an injury concern for Celtic heading into the weekend.

arts.ttl: Ross McCormack says Brendan Rodgers is 'harshly' treating Celtic star
arts.sum: That opened the door for Scales to start again and keep his place for Celtic’s 4-0 win over Motherwell, with Trusty returning to the bench. Last season, before a ball was kicked, Scales was seen as a fringe player, at best, before producing his best campaign and starting regularly alongside Carter-Vickers.

arts.ttl: Buzzing Brendan Rodgers names 4 Celtic pluses that left him purring as champions get their mojo back in Motherwell stroll
arts.sum: The Irishman watched his team get back to winning ways with a thumping victory over the Steelmen

arts.ttl: Stuart Kettlewell blasts Celtic penalty and claims referee treated Motherwell like 'school children'
arts.sum: Well boss Kettlewell wasn't a happy man with ref Ross Hardie after two disputed decisions at both ends of the park

arts.ttl: Arne Engels explains keeping penalty duties despite Celtic vs Rangers Premier Sports Cup masterclass
arts.sum: Arne Engels says Celtic have numerous penalty taker options “No, I think everybody is training on it so everyone can take a penalty and I’m lucky I’m the one who can take it first,” Engels told Celtic TV .

arts.ttl: Celtic predicted XI vs Motherwell as Brendan Rodgers counts on fitness of key stars
arts.sum: Your predicted XI in full is as follows: Schmeichel, Johnston, Trusty, Scales, Valle, McGregor, Bernardo, McCowan, Yang, Maeda, Idah. Celtic are back in action today against Motherwell as the Bhoys play host for the first time on Boxing Day for over a decade.

arts.ttl: BBC pundit says Brendan Rodgers wasn't impressed by Celtic star during win v Motherwell
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers wasn’t impressed by Adam Idah as Celtic beat Motherwell “I don’t think Brendan Rodgers is impressed there with Adam Idah,” said Bonner.

arts.ttl: Celtic rediscover shooting boots and prove doubting Brendan Rodgers' champions is a dangerous game - 3 talking points
arts.sum: Brendan Rodgers watched four different scorers hit the back of the net on a comfortable afternoon for the champions
